CommitComments.CommitComment: Cleaned up and formatted. Fixed a bunch of bugs. Added help pages, copyright info, license, etc.
Cleaned up a bunch, fixed a f
cleaned and documented code. JavaDocs still needs to be done, as does ptp's cleanup and format. Also need thorough debug on all platforms.
Cleaned and documented code. Javadocs haven't yet been done, nor the official ptp clean and format. Also needs to be thoroughly debugged.
Latest update, this will shortly be put online.
Fixed a few problems, including a small one in the communication protocol.
Fixed a few large bugs that were introduced over weekend. Basic testing on deployed plug-in now half complete.
